required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Development of an Screening System in Children With Congenital Heart Disease Based on Cloud Computing and Big Data
clinical_study.official_title: Development of an Screening System in Children With Congenital Heart Disease Based on Cloud Computing and Big Data

lead_sponsor.agency: Xinhua Hospital, Shanghai Jiao Tong University School of Medicine

collaborator.agency: Shanghai Jiao Tong University School of Medicine

clinical_study.source: Xinhua Hospital, Shanghai Jiao Tong University School of Medicine

brief_summary.textblock: This study intends to establish an automatic system for screening on children with congenital heart disease, the system include the auscultation of cardiac murmur and the test of oxygen saturation, the data was analyzed based on the cloud computing.

detailed_description.textblock: This study intends to establish a system for screening of children with congenital heart disease,with the combination of cardiac auscultation , the test of oxygen saturation, the use of cloud computing and data base. The investigators decide to do this project from three main points.1:How to establish a data-base system? 2:How to get heart sound signal? 3.How to analyze so many signals?

primary_outcome.description: The ratio of truly congenital heart disease cases divide by the total positive cases detected by the screening test.

intervention.intervention_name: automatic screening machine on congenital heart disease

study_pop.textblock: This study include between between newborn to 10 years old.Heart sound signal need to be collected to analyze children's heart health status and creat a special model of each kind of CHD.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Neonatal ward patients
- Patients with echocardiography reports
Exclusion Criteria:
- Severe pneumonia

overall_official.affiliation: Pediatric cardiovascular department, Shanghai xinhua hospital

patient_data.ipd_description: The investigator do not plan to share the data until the project is totally completed
